author: Special Correspondent
text:
The branch of the Jawaharlal Institute of Post Graduate Medical Education and Research (Jipmer) would be commissioned shortly in Karaikal.

Admission for 2016-2017 academic year would commence from June, said Chief Minister N.Rangasamy here on Sunday.

Talking to reporters here, Chief Minister Mr. Rangasamy said following request from the people of Karaikal for super specialty medical services , we decided to set up a new branch of Jipmer with a hospital and college.

The governing council of Jipmer has also given its approval for starting college-cum-hospital.

He said land acquired for the purpose would be handed over and construction would commence soon, he also added. Mr. Rangasamy said the Jipmer branch would begin functioning at a nursing college in Karaikal until the construction of buildings is completed in the land allotted.
title: Branch of Jipmer will be commissioned in Karaikal by June: Rangasamy
